event.title: was elected king in that city in the year 672

data.event: Its name comes from the Gothic King Wamba , who was elected king in that city in the year 672 . At that time it was called GÃ©rticos and King Recceswinth had a villa there resting.

event.title: died in this town, the nobles elected Wamba immediately that day

data.event: As Receswinth died in this town, the nobles elected Wamba immediately that day.
